column1: Police Chase is a promo I remember getting in 2016
column3: t too fond of it and today my opinion is unchanged .

column1: The builds are a police car and a getaway car and they are both just fine made out of basic uninteresting pieces and the only playability is driving them around . The horrible cheap cardboard ramp and score board are just a cost saving measure and is something that I never bothered to keep in 2016
column3: t regret that decision I prefer only having the cars&nbsp

column1: this is one of my least favorite owned sets and I wish Lego
column2: would stop including cardboard that is intended to interact with the bricks its not part of the Lego system so stop using it .
